name: Little Johnny
description:
This game is initially made during & for Mini Jam 42: Snow. 

It's freezing December, help little Johnny reach the fire place to get cozy and eventually to his home!

Avoid: Freezing Fridge & Snowman.
Controls: Arrow Keys

This game was made in 2 days for Mini Jam 42: Snow, I would like to update the game and make it a complete version. I'd love to hear your comments and feel free to report bugs if any.

Enjoy!
